title.en: Desert Rose & Blazing Transfer Student - Blazing USA (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: Blazing Transfer Student dj - Blazing USA: Blazing Transfer Student vs. Desert Rose
Blazing USA: Blazing Transfer Student vs. Desert Rose

description.en:
An official doujinshi drawn and written by [Kaoru](https://www.mangaupdates.com/authors.html?id=4414) [Shintani](https://myanimelist.net/people/3840/Kaoru_Shintani) under the pen name of 88 Night,  
in collaboration with [Kazuhiko Shimamoto](https://www.mangaupdates.com/authors.html?id=909), [Noboru Takizawa](https://mangadex.org/manga/4581)'s creator.  
  
Part of a series of doujinshi where the [CAT Division M](https://mangadex.org/manga/15646/desert-rose) teams or clashes with other action/seinen manga characters including Gunsmith Cats pair and the Sukeban Deka heroine, usually developed by Shintani in collaboration with their creators  
(a notable exception being the first one, Desert Rose vs Akihime, where Shintani's characters meet the heroine of his wife Saeki Kayono's shoujo/josei manga; clearly the couple created it together)
